kDesc
The augusta has large leaves with long diamond-shaped tips.[#Legal]
L'augusta a de larges feuilles avec des extrémités en forme de diamant.[#Legal]
Die Augusta hat große Blätter mit langen diamantförmigen Spitzen.[#Legal]
L'augusta ha delle foglie lunghe con le punte a forma di diamante.[#Legal]
La cinchona tiene enormes hojas que terminan en forma de diamante.[#Legal]
長い花茎の先に大きな葉をつける、オーガスタの観葉植物。[#Legal]
긴 꽃대 끝에 큰 꽃을 피우는 관엽식물 큰극락조화. [#Legal]
A house plant named augusta with large leaves at the end of the long stems.[#Legal]
長長的花莖末端長有寬大葉子的鶴望蘭盆栽。[#Legal]
長長的花莖末端長有寬大葉子的鶴望蘭盆栽。[#Legal]
The augusta has large leaves with long diamond-shaped tips.[#Legal]
